name: Nine Lives (itch) (ali3n, YYYY, that-sevvi)
description:
Nine Lives - Play as a cat who has woken up in the sky as you try to make your way down to land safely. Made for Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice in 3 days!

Use WASD to move. Press W or SPACE to jump. Hold W or SPACE after jumping to increase jump height. Tap W or SPACE while in mid-air to double-jump. Press R to restart.

Follow ali3n on twitter @ali3ndev

Follow YYYY on twitter @YYYY_mus

Follow that_sevvi on twitter @That_Sevvi
